summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ACE (Academic Clarity Engine) - Penn State academic advisor assistant. All core features working correctly including login, two-column layout, AI chat with structured responses, and backend APIs.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/student/profile returns correct mocked student data (Jordan Chen, xyz9012345)
Backend API /api/student/intelligence returns deadline warning card
Backend API /api/chat/send works with OpenAI GPT-5.2 integration
Backend API /api/policies returns 8 Penn State policies
Login page loads with Penn State SSO button and ACE branding
Mocked login navigation from / to /assistant works correctly
Two-column layout with 320px left sidebar and chat workspace
Student profile displays correctly in left sidebar
Intelligence card shows withdrawal deadline warning
Quick starter buttons (4 total) work correctly
AI chat returns structured responses with direct answer, next steps, sources, risk indicator
Collapsible sources section with policy links
Chat history appears in left sidebar after conversations
Welcome state returns when starting new conversation
